titleStmt.title: Gods mercy and justice displayed, in the wicked life and penitential death of Dorothy Lillingstone executed the 7. of April, 1679. at Kennington, for murthering her bastard-childe. Published at her earnest request. With Allowance.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J. Bennet, for R. Miller,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 1: The life and death of Dorothy Lillingstone.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
